definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: missile, spark (√ dub.; cf. NH [[זִיקִין]] fiery arrows, Aram. [[זִיקָא]] id., [[זִיקוּקָא]] id. + spark, ziyqo0 shooting star, ray of light, ziyqto0 shooting star)—only pl. [[זִקִּים]] of (fire- ?) missiles Pr 26:18 (‖[[חִצִּים]], c. [[ירה]]); so [[זִיקוֹת]] sparks, brands (as leaping, springing, forth ?) ´[[מְאַזְּרֵי ז]] (v. [[אזר]]) Is 50:11 (‖[[קׂדְחֵי אֵשׁ]]), [[בִּעַרְתֶּם]] ´[[ז]] v:Is 50:11 (‖[[אוּר אֶשְׁכֶם]]).
